issue.subject: New stereotype : Download - online resource
issue.description:
New stereotype proposal.
ISO 19115 has fields for downloadable data in distributionInfo .. transferOptions .. CI_OnlineResource etc...
It would be great if easySDI was able to fill in this fields with database informations of SHOP when a product download is available ! This could be achieved by a stereotype (as it could be places anywhere in MD tree).

Same question as in #800 applies: is it stored at edit time, or injected by java proxy ?
